trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when an attempt is made to open a system mutex, semaphore, or event wait handle that does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試開啟不存在的系統 Mutex、旗號或事件等候控制代碼時所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Instances of the <xref:System.Threading.Mutex>, <xref:System.Threading.Semaphore>, and <xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle> classes can represent named system synchronization objects.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體<xref:System.Threading.Mutex>， <xref:System.Threading.Semaphore>，和<xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle>類別則表示具名的系統同步處理物件。

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Threading.Mutex.OpenExisting%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, the <xref:System.Threading.Semaphore.OpenExisting%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, or the <xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.OpenExisting%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to open a named system object that does not exist, a <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandleCannotBeOpenedException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.Threading.Mutex.OpenExisting%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，<xref:System.Threading.Semaphore.OpenExisting%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，或<xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.OpenExisting%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法來開啟不存在，為具名的系統物件<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandleCannotBeOpenedException>擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandleCannotBeOpenedException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandleCannotBeOpenedException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandleCannotBeOpenedException" /> class with default values.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設值，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandleCannotBeOpenedException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "No handle of the given name exists."
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性的新執行個體的系統提供的訊息描述錯誤，例如 「 沒有控制代碼所指定名稱的存在 」。

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此訊息會考量目前的系統文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandleCannotBeOpenedException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandleCannotBeOpenedException> 執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: `null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The system-supplied error message string.
trans-unit.target: 系統提供的錯誤訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandleCannotBeOpenedException" /> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandleCannotBeOpenedException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The content of `message` is intended to be understood by humans.
trans-unit.target: `message` 的內容必須能讓人了解。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandleCannotBeOpenedException> initialized with this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示執行個體的初始屬性值<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandleCannotBeOpenedException>使用這個建構函式初始化。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: `null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: `message`.
trans-unit.target: `message`。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 物件，包含有關擲回之例外狀況的序列化物件資料。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> object that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> 物件，包含關於來源或目的端的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandleCannotBeOpenedException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 使用序列化資料，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandleCannotBeOpenedException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>innerException</c> 參數不是 <see langword="null" />，則目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外的 <see langword="catch" /> 區塊中引發。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandleCannotBeOpenedException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandleCannotBeOpenedException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `null` 屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。
